title: 04/21/21 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Bacon
itunes:title: 04/21/21 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Bacon
description:
Kevin Bacon talks to Dan about his new role as an actor. Kevin says his wife is an actress and she has seen just about everything from him as an actor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
